nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (graphic novellas)

Star Wars: The Clone Wars graphic novellas are a series of comic books that started in 2008, as a tie-in to Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series. Based on the art style of the show, it was released in digest-sized format and is similar to Clone Wars Adventures, but contains a single story instead of several. The graphic novellas also coincided with the monthly Star Wars: The Clone Wars comic issues, which were later collected in Trade Paperbacks, in the same sized format as the digest-sized graphic novellas. The issues were released at irregular dates until the series ended in 2013.
